snippet: So you think this is easy? Here's what Pro Picks was up against on opening weekend: road teams going 9-7, nine teams trailing in the fourth quarter before winning....
lead_paragraph: So you think this is easy? Here's what Pro Picks was up against on opening weekend: road teams going 9-7, nine teams trailing in the fourth quarter before winning.

headline.main: So You Think This Is Easy? Look How Weird Opening Week Was
headline.print_headline: So You Think This Is Easy? Look How Weird Opening Week Was
